articles.title: Working People's Organizations' Plenary Meetings Held
articles.content:
Working People's Organizations Have Plenary Meetings
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- The 73rd Plenary Meeting of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea and the 50th Plenary Meeting of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League took place here on Sunday.
					 Present there were members and alternate members of the central committees of the working people's organizations. 
					
					 They discussed the tasks for devotedly implementing the line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force set forth at the March, 2013 Plenary Meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The reporters and speakers said the line is a succession of the original line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and defence up-building set forth and thoroughly implemented by Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, and the development of the line onto a higher stage.
					
					 The advancement of the strategic line to be consistently held fast to by the army and the people provided the immortal program for achieving a final victory in the confrontation with the U.S. and the building of a thriving socialist nation, they noted, adding:
					
					 The bodies should make organizational and political work in a meticulous way so as to arouse all their members to the implementation of the line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force.
					
					 They will contribute to demonstrating the dignity and spirit of Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea by devotedly implementing the party's strategic line, single-mindedly united around the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Suppressing Freedom of Thought
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Suppressing Freedom of Thought
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the south Korean Supreme Court sentenced to prison terms a south Korean writer on the charge of the violation of the "Security Law". He introduced the stirring situation of the DPRK. The prosecution authorities are persecuting a movie supervisor on the charge of posting on website "Literature" praising the north, labeling it "one benefiting the enemy."
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday says in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is a heinous human rights abuse ruthlessly trampling down the freedom of thought and the right to conscience and a vicious action to escalate the confrontation with the north. It is an unpardonable act to crack down on the south Korean forces seeking reunification through alliance with the north.
					
					 What intellectuals of south Korea did was nothing but their expression of high respect, reverence and admiration for the peerlessly great persons whom the whole nation looks up to and their manifestation of ardent desire for reunification. Their deeds, therefore, deserve praise.
					
					 The south Korean puppet group unhesitatingly let loose a spate of outbursts that "it is necessary to suppress the freedom of expression", kicking up a whirlwind of brutal suppression. Lurking behind this is a sinister intention. 
					
					 The group is intensifying the fascist offensive to stamp out forces for achieving reunification through alliance with the north in a sinister bid to bar this trend from growing among south Koreans and justify its moves for confrontation and war.
					
					 Mindset represents justice and truth and no force on earth can quell this. South Koreans are trusting and following the DPRK as a fortress for defending the sovereignty and the future of a reunified country, revering the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu. Neither bayonet nor violence can suppress these feelings.
					
					 The puppet authorities had better stop at once the unreasonable suppression of the freedom of thought in violation of public mindset and opt for rolling back their anachronistic policy of confrontation with fellow countrymen.

articles.title: Japan Accused of Denying Its History of Aggression
articles.content:
Japan Accused of Denying Its History of Aggression
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- Members of the Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps in south Korea, together with victims of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, went to the Japanese embassy in Seoul on April 26 and thrust a written protest to the Abe government, which denies Japan's history of aggression and embellishes its war crimes, south Korean CBS reported.
					 The council in the written protest denounced Japanese Prime Minister Abe for letting loose a spate of remarks distorting the history of aggression and Japanese Dietmen for paying a group visit to Yasukuni Shrine.
					
					 This is an unpardonable provocation, it said, warning that Japanese society's lurch to the Right would isolate Japan in the end.

articles.title: Sophism of Nuclear War Maniacs Can Never Work: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Sophism of Nuclear War Maniacs Can Never Work: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) --The U.S. and the south Korean authorities are now floating misinformation that the DPRK is to blame for the failure to open dialogue after putting up the absurd precondition that "the north should stop making provocative remarks" and show its will for "denuclearization", to begin with.
					 Rodong Sinmun on Sunday observes in a bylined article in this regard:
					
					 Such remarks as "provocation from the north" and "threat from it" made by the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers are nothing but sophism to hide their bellicose nature and justify their moves for a war against the north.
					
					 It is a trademark tactic of the U.S. and the puppet regime of south Korea to go reckless in war moves after labeling the DPRK "a provocateur".
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. and its south Korean puppet regime that have driven the situation on the Korean Peninsula to such an extremely dangerous phase.
					
					 They introduced nuclear-capable strategic bombers and nuclear-powered subs and other nuclear strike means of various types into south Korea and its vicinity for madcap Foal Eagle war drills against the north. This was an extremely dangerous military provocation as they were aimed to unleash a nuclear war in Korea.
					
					 The south Korean puppet regime also worked out "a plan to jointly cope with the provocation of a local war" under a scenario to develop any armed conflict between the north and the south of Korea into an all-out war.
					
					 This was an undisguised action of the U.S. to let the puppet regime preempt an attack on the north and hurl all its aggression forces in its mainland and the Pacific region into operations, using it as a pretext, and launch an all-out war against the north.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime are slandering the DPRK under the pretext of "provocation" from it in a sinister bid to ratchet the international "sanctions" against it and escalate such war moves.
					
					  It is shameless, indeed, for the arch criminals responsible for the grave situation in Korea to brand the DPRK as "a provocateur," painting themselves as victims.

articles.title: Abolition of Part-time Job Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Abolition of Part-time Job Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- Members of the Metal Workers Trade Union of south Korea held a rally outside Hyundai, Kia Motors in Seoul on April 26 at which they demanded the abolition of part-time job, south Korean KBS reported.
					 At the rally speakers deplored the ceaseless death of part-time workers as evidenced by the self-immolation of a worker of the Kwangju subcontract enterprise of Kia Motors.
					
					 They demanded the company management immediately turn part-time job into full-time job.

articles.title: Day of Sun Celebrated in Japan
articles.content:
Day of Sun Celebrated in Japan
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- A Japan-Korea friendship meeting took place in Tokyo on April 18 to celebrate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present there were personages of the Japan Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea, organizations for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people and Juche idea study organizations and masses.
					
					 Present there on invitation were So Chung On, director of the International Affairs and Reunification Department of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), and other Chongryon officials.
					
					 Fumihiro Himori, chairman of the Japan committee, made a report at the meeting, which was followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers praised the sacred revolutionary career and undying feats of Kim Il Sung, saying that he devoted himself to socialist construction, the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea, the normalization of Japan-DPRK relations and peace and stability in Northeast Asia in the idea of independence, peace and friendship.
					
					 The situation on the Korean Peninsula has become tenser than ever before due to the U.S. and its followers' policy toward the DPRK, they said, adding: In order to defuse the crisis on the peninsula it is necessary to conclude a DPRK-U.S. peace treaty.
					
					 They said that they would conduct positive activities to have the Korean Armistice Agreement (AA) replaced by a peace treaty this year marking the 60th anniversary of the signing of the AA by fulfilling the responsibility and duty as the people of Japan which enforced a colonial rule over Korea for decades.
					
					 The present Japanese government is enforcing an undisguised discrimination policy against Koreans in Japan, they said, noting that they would wage a staunch struggle against this.
					
					 They hoped that the Korean people would register successes in building a thriving socialist nation under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, the successor to the cause of Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il, and that Korea would be reunified independently, the relations between Japan and the DPRK be normalized and peace and stability be ensured in Northeast Asia as early as possible.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Report Carried by Mozambican Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Report Carried by Mozambican Paper 
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- A detailed gist of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's report at the March, 2013 plenary meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea was carried by the Mozambican paper Noticias on April 20.
					 The report made by him on March 31, Juche 102 (2013), lays down a new strategic line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force as required by the prevailing situation and the developing Korean revolution. It also indicates tasks and ways to carry it out.

articles.title: DPRK Praised by Russian Figure
articles.content:
DPRK Praised by Russian Figure
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- The Russian paper Zavtra on April 11 carried an article titled "Comrade Kim Jong Un wins" contributed by its editor-in-chief Alexandr Prokhanov.
					 The world is facing the danger of a nuclear war due to the situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula, the article said.
					
					 The DPRK is a country of Songun, an indomitable and unbreakable country of heroes, it noted, and went on:
					
					 It has built a world-startling highly civilized society and a valuable entity despite the enemies' bombast, smear campaign, threat and merciless propaganda offensive. It is spreading to other continents forming a huge trend.  The DPRK is standing up against big powers.
					
					 It is teaching mankind a right option. This is the reason why the U.S. and its followers are aiming at the DPRK with missiles and letting its carriers and formations of its bombers make sorties to this region.
					
					 There are in the DPRK the united people, the army organized with their beloved sons and daughters, the first-class munitions industry, fruition of many years' labor, and a complex of nukes and rockets.
					
					 The DPRK is showing the corrupt world engrossed in dissipation and avarice the tremendous capability to be displayed by the people convinced of the future when they will emerge victorious, united close around the party and the leader.
					
					 At a time when the Western propaganda offensive against the DPRK grew fierce and the U.S. was mobilizing huge forces against it, the March, 2013 Plenary Meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea was held in Pyongyang.
					
					 The meeting adopted the new strategic line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Lauded by Personages of Romania, Russia, Bulgaria
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Lauded by Personages of Romania, Russia, Bulgaria
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- Meetings took place in Romania, Russia and Bulgaria on April 7 and 9 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Constantin Rotaru, chairman of the Romanian Socialist Union, in his speech praised Kim Il Sung as the great leader and tender-hearted father who devoted himself to the prosperity of the country and its people's happiness all his life. The stirring situation of the DPRK is the fruition of the total dedication made by Kim Il Sung to the revolution and construction after founding the great Juche idea, he noted.
					
					 Vadim Kudimin, chairman of the Russian Society for Promoting the Study and Dissemination of Comrade Kim Jong Il's Works, said that the DPRK has become a full-fledged satellite manufacturer and launcher and nuclear weapons state and the March, 2013 Plenary Meeting of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea adopted a new strategic line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force. He bitterly denounced the U.S. imperialists and their stooges for their base moves to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 He expressed conviction that the Korean people led by the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un would defeat the imperialists and fully demonstrate the mental power of Kim Il Sung's nation.
					
					 A reporter and other speakers including Chairman Simeon Ignatov and Vice-Chairman Milcho Gyurov of the Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association lauded the sacred revolutionary career of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The undying feats he performed for the Korean people and world progressives will shine long in history, they noted.
					
					 They expressed belief that the Korean people would shatter the anti-DPRK moves of the imperialists and certainly win a final victory under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: WPK's New Strategic Line Supported by Figures of South Africa, Uganda
articles.content:
WPK's New Strategic Line Supported by Figures of South Africa, Uganda
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- Personages of South Africa and Uganda issued statements on April 12 and 13 in support of the new strategic line laid out by the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The secretary of a provincial Committee of the South African Communist Party said the line set forth by the dear respected Kim Jong Un on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force is the most patriotic and just revolutionary line.
					
					 He extended full support to the Korean people's struggle, expressing belief that the DPRK is sure to win in the sacred war against the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 The chairman of the Ugandan National Executive Committee of the Pan-African Movement said they would always remember President Kim Il Sung, who positively supported the African people in their struggle to achieve independence.
					
					 Kim Il Sung put forward the original line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and defence upbuilding in the 1960s, turning the DPRK into a socialist power which no hostile forces dared provoke, the chairman noted, adding he was the great leader well versed in everything.
					
					 The DPRK is now thoroughly applying the principle of independence in politics, self-support in the economy and self-reliance in national defence while invariably holding aloft the banner of the Juche idea under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He manifested full support for the line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force, regarding it as the most just line which helps defend the security and sovereignty of the country, ensure the sustainable economic development and improve the standard of people's living.

articles.title: KPA Birthday Marked in Nigeria
articles.content:
KPA Birthday Marked in Nigeria
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- There took place a Korean photo exhibition and a lecture in Nigeria on April 18 and 19 on the occasion of the 81st birthday of the Korean People's Army.
					 Displayed in the venue of the photo exhibition were photos dealing with the Songun leadership feats of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display there were photos on the proud victory of the KPA and photos on the Korean people's struggle to defend the sovereignty and build a thriving nation.
					
					 The deputy manager of a hotel in Abuja, Nigeria, said in a speech at the opening ceremony of the photo exhibition that the KPA is fully prepared politically and ideologically and in military technique and has grown to be a matchless army equipped with even nuclear deterrent.
					
					 The chairman of the Nigerian Group for the Study of the Songun Politics said in a lecture titled "Undying Songun feats of leader Kim Jong Il":
					
					 Kim Jong Il put forward the KPA as the pillar and main force of the socialist cause and made sure that whole society learned from the revolutionary soldier spirit displayed by the service personnel. As a result, there is close unity between the army and people in their ideological view and fighting trait. This means that the traditional single-minded unity of Korean society has been put on a higher stage.
					
					 He made sure that popular policies such as free education and free healthcare were enforced even late in the past century when the DPRK was facing worst difficulties and ordeals, instilling firmer faith in socialism into all people.
					
					 He devoted himself to improving the standard of people's living, regarding it as his maxim to believe in people as in Heaven.
					
					 His Songun revolutionary leadership is being successfully carried forward by Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Peruvian Party Condemns US Moves against DPRK
articles.content:
Peruvian Party Condemns US Moves against DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- A meeting for solidarity with the Korean people was held in Lima, Peru on April 19.
					 The international secretary of the Central Committee of the Peruvian Communist Party in a speech at a meeting condemned the U.S. imperialists for persisting in their moves against the DPRK for several decades, adding that their goal is to turn the whole of Korea into their colony and use it as a springboard for dominating the world.
					
					 The Korean people won victory in the war fought against the U.S. imperialists and brought about the beginning of the downhill turn for U.S. imperialism under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung, he said and went on:
					
					 The Korean people set a worldwide example by successfully carrying on socialist construction in the post-war period.
					
					 The U.S. is persistently laying a hurdle in the way of Korea's reunification in a bid to perpetuate its military presence in south Korea.
					
					 The moves of the U.S. and its followers to stifle the DPRK reached their height over the DPRK's satellite launch on Dec. 12, 2012. They prodded the UN Security Council into fabricating the unreasonable "resolution on sanctions" and staged large-scale war drills to threaten the DPRK. 
					
					 The DPRK is taking such tough countermeasures as conducting its third underground nuclear test as a legitimate step for self-defence to cope with their moves to stifle it.
					
					 The U.S. is entirely to blame for the grave situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula on the eve of a war.
					
					 The Korean people are a heroic and peace-loving people who are leading the struggle for achieving independence against imperialism and protecting world peace.
					
					 The Peruvian Communist Party and the world progressives vehemently denounce the warmonger U.S. for its moves to invade the DPRK and send full support and solidarity to the Workers' Party of Korea and its people in their struggle for freedom, independence and sovereignty.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre Complejo de Salud Haedangwa en visperas de inauguracion
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre Complejo de Salud Haedangwa en visperas de inauguracion
Pyongyang, 28 de abril (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, junto con su esposa Ri Sol Ju, recorrio el Complejo de Salud Haedanghwa, construida en la pintoresca ribera del rio Taedong, como base universal y multifuncional de servicio dotada de modernos establecimientos gastronomicos y publicos.
					Tras dar recorrido por el aparcamiento subterraneo capaz de parquear a la vez decenas de carros, entro en el hall de primer piso.
					
					Dijo lleno de alegria que ya habia apreciado el diseno y la construccion viendo los datos referentes a la edificacion de la Casa Haedanghwa, presentados por la rama correspondiente y que de veras la acondiciono bien al presenciarla en el terreno.
					
					Recorriendo la tienda y varios salones de comida desplegados en el primer y segundo pisos, respectivamente, se entero en detalles del estado de construccion y el plan de servicio.
					
					Volvio a evaluar altamente que se han construido con peculiaridad de manera arquitectonica la tienda con diversas mercancias y todos los salones de comida.
					
					Paso por el cuarto que sirve de la carne asada sobre la plancha de hierro con varias carnes y productos maritimos.
					
					La culinaria es ciencia y arte, dijo y agrego que los cocineros deben elevar sin cesar su nivel de tecnica y habilidad y poner de manifiesto la creatividad para servir al pueblo de muchos platos sabrosos y nutritivos.
					
					Expreso la esperanza de que los cocineros cumplan con su mision de servidores fieles al pueblo y se fotografio junto a ellos.
					
					Acto seguido, el Mariscal visito el bano publico, piscinas de diversion barberia, la peluqueria, salones de gimnasia, ping-pong y billar y otras instalaciones de servicio publico y de fomento de fuerza fisica, acondicionados en tercer y cuarto pisos.
					
					En el bano publico comprobo directamente la temperatura de agua, en el maquillaje se informo de generos de servicios y en la piscina de diversion se mostro satisfecho por bueno ambiente.
					
					Recorriendo uno tras otro los cuartos de sauna, acondicionados con peculiares materiales de construccion como sal pedres y los minerales cuarzosos como agata, ocre, etc. se mostro muy alegre diciendo que todos son magnificos.
					
					En los salones de gimnasia y ping-pong, se cercioro en detalles de cuales aparatos deportivos se hayan instalado.
					
					En el salon de billar vio el reloj colgado en la pared en forma de bola y mesa de billar y evaluo altamente la destreza de los elementos de construccion.
					
					Luego, el Mariscal recorrio la biblioteca electronica y las salas de ejercicios practicos y de leccion.
					
					Dio a las ramas correspondientes la orden de enviar varios datos y videos alusivos a la culinaria.
					
					Asevero que para adiestrar el arte culinario, es insuficiente tener solo la teoria e hizo hincapie en suministrar suficientemente las materias primas necesarias al adiestramiento culinario para que los cursantes puedan ganar los conocimientos vivos.
					
					Por ultimo, el Mariscal hizo recorrido por la cafeteria circular acondicionada en el sexto piso, donde se informo en detalles del plan de servicio.
					
					Es la decision firme del partido hacer que el pueblo coreano, el mejor en el mundo, no sufra mas las dificultades, sino disfrute a sus anchas de todas las opulencias socialistas, recalco y subrayo que deben construir mucho modernas bases de servicio similares al Complejo de Salud Haedanghwa. 
					
					Le acompanaron al Mariscal Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Song Thaek, Hyon Yong Chol, Kim Kyok Sik, Kim Kyong Hui, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Kang Sok Ju, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Yong Il, Kim Phyong Hae, Kwak Pom Gi, Mun Kyong Dok, O Il Jong, Paek Kye Ryong, Han Kwang Sang y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito.
